title: The Air Fryer Diet: Lose Weight Fast
overview: This series is packed full of ingenious ways to feel healthier, save cash and smash your way into the New Year, with your trusted air fryer by your side. Presented by Cherry Healey, we compare and contrast all your favourite meals and treats with an air fryer version. Nutritionist Jenny Tschiesche counts the calories, while air fryer chef Dan Edwards recommends fast and furious food that also works wonders for the waistline.
